fields_of_interest: Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: All those concerned with the automotive industry and environmental monitoring (air, water etc)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Working Group on Motor Vehicles#E01295#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1295#Not a member#C#Heavy Duty Portable Emissions Measurement Systems Expert Group (HD PEMS)#EU-World Harmonized Light-duty Vehicles Testing Procedure #Evaporative Emissions
goals__remit:
HORIBA is a manufacturer of automotive testing systems including those used for exhaust emissions and fuel economy determination. 
HORIBA is also involved as a manufacturer of environmental monitoring systems both for air and water 
HORIBA has other divisions involved in Medical, Semiconductor and Scientific business segments
